channel.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
channel.description:
What do [i][b]you[/b][/i] want to see on E3 this year? Maybe some news from VALVe? More informations on Rage or Crysis 2? A playable demo of Super Mario Galaxy 2 or Halo: Reach?[i] A new Tetris[/i]!?
But then what is E3? E3 stands for [i]Electronic Entertainment Expo[/i] hence the E3. :slight_smile:
"[i]It is used by many video game developers to show off their upcoming games and game-related hardware.[/i]" - Wikipedia.
This years E3 is scheduled to be from June 15 to June 17.
So what do you want to see, or what you don't want to see?

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Starcraft 2. That is, if Blizzard attends, no idea if they will.

Read full topic

item.source: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: TheGr8erG00d
item.description:
Something from Valve that isn’t Left4Dead or Portal… As much as I love both of those games, I could care less for them at this point.

We need something on Episode 3.

And to hold me over I’d like to be playing Black Mesa. I’ve been against everyone that’s impatiently complained about this mod not being finished. However, with it being set to release at the end of last year (and I understand this date being pushed back [I]some[I] and it now getting close to May of the next year, I really want to know what’s going on. There hasn’t been an update since January.

Read full topic
item.source: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: Maxx_Skywalker
item.description:
Looking forward to:

-More information on the new Zelda effort for Wii – as it is most likely confirmed that there will be.
-News on Grinder, though I’m not digging the top-down shoot 'em up reworking of the title. I hope the Wii version is different, and better.
-Some great new IP that Nintendo should be working on.
-Half Life 2: Episode 3, or even better, just Half Life 3. If they’ve spent this much time on it, I would imagine a full fledged sequel is in the works by now, you know, with a new engine.
-BlackMesa developers surprise everyone with release news exclusively at E3.

Just kidding on that last part.

Read full topic
item.source: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: Llewen_Ebag
item.description:
Simply put, a fucking teaser of Episode 3.

Or at least a bunch of screenshots, or a indication that Valve is working on it, rather than leaving it to become a legend to be told to the generations that may come after the apocalypse.

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
hercule poirots nutsack:

uhm kojima is a genius and can do what he wants

Well, that’s what should happen, but Konami keeps making him to more Metal Gear when he wants to do other things!

That’s why he made MGS4, to end the series and get his fans to shut the fuck up!.. but now he’s working on MGS: Peace Walker, so…

Let’s hope he stays the fuck away from Rising. If Rising sells well, and is well received, then it will show Konami that Metal Gear does not need Kojima.

I’m hoping he’s working on that survival horror game he once mentioned.

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Acristoff:

I know but it was licensed by Bungie since they were using their IP, at least the Saw creators have the decency to publicly say “We’ll stop making more once we stop getting a profit from them”.

No. Microsoft owns the Halo license now. What they do to the IP is out of Bungie’s control at this point.

Why else do you think Halo: Legends was made? Artist integrity? Hahaha!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Acristoff

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Acristoff:

I know I was just trying to make fun of you.

Fuck you too, man.

Acristoff:

But making a new Halo is like making another Saw sequel, you know what I mean.

I know exactly what you mean.

I’m actually going to stop caring about Halo once Bungie stops making the games (which will hopefully be Reach.) I want to see what else they can do. Where they go, I’ll follow.

Edit: On a similar note, KOJIMA! PLEASE[/SIZE] STOP MAKING METAL GEAR GAMES![/SIZE]
That is all. :3

Read full topic

item.title: E3 2010 - What you want to see, or don't?
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Acristoff:

You’re just saying that because Halo counts as a milked franchise. :3

No. I said that because I hate it when people say there aren’t any new IPs coming out. There are. You just have to look for them.
Right now, I can name LA Noir, Last Guardian, Heavy Rain, and Alan Wake at the top of my head, as games of new IPs that was released this year/will be released.
